title: On Mac using Safari drop downs need to be selected multiple times
description: On Mac using Safari drop downs need to be selected multiple - multiple - multiple times

title: Scope
description:
The Project Scope is limited to 1000 characters. I find this out after I've pasted in the scope statement from the Word version. 

Two things: either tell me how much I'm over (i.e. 1500 / 1000); or remove the limitation. I vote for the latter.

title: Project deliverables
description: the real estate for the deliverables is too small. The number of characters for the deliverables is too small

title: I don't seem to have the ability to add contacts
description: Hello - Now that i have more time on my hands I thought I would take Traxidy for a longer test drive - I am supposed to have full access, however, I don't appear to have the ability to add contacts - the only option I have is to delete.

title: Subtasks
description: There needs to be an ability to enter subtasks in the High Level Plan.  Most times, the primary task would be something like Initiation but we need to keep track, at a higher level, some Initiation tasks but this does not allow me to do so.  It should be limited to at least 3 levels down.

title: Import
description: Many times, a project manager is tracking their project in MS project or other tools but they need to use a PPM tool since it is the source of the truth.  There needs to be a feature to allow the import of mpp files.  You should be able to import it initially to setup the project or import it to update the project's tasks.

title: Ability to add tasks by hitting the <Insert> or right clicking on the mouse
description: If users are used to using MS Project, they can insert a new task by hitting the <Insert> key on their keyboard.  This feature should be supported as well as right clicking on the mouse and clicking Insert task.

title: Overall project status
description: There should be a way of having the overall project GYR status calculated.  If the GYR for Scope, Schedule, etc, are yellow or red, the overall project status should be yellow or red.  It should depend on the business rules define.  For example, in the past, if any part of the project was yellow or red, then the Project's status was Yellow or Red.
